What do you have to
know about K2?

We have been creating interactive experiences
for 21 years. See how.

1.

We are the biggest agency in Poland
with three, combined, specializations:

We build brands. We create ideas that work in every medium. We blur the lines between offline and online. We can create communication format for TV as well as content to fit the social media perfectly.

We create digital products. We design innovative services and user interfaces like an UX agency. Our IT team is composed of 50+ people and develops complex platforms, apps and websites like a software house.

We transform business. We act as a consulting company, but we do not flood our clients with thousands of slides.

2.

We help companies to deliver unified consumer experience.

From advertisements, content in social media, to website or chatbot on your mobile device. The same as customers swiftly transit from the contact with the brand’s communication to using services or shopping, we are able to swiftly manage this experience.

And all because we offer wide range of services.

3.

The projects of our clients won over 160 awards.

For creativity, for design, for technology, for strategy, for results. 33 KTRs, 15 Innovation Awards, 15 Kreaturas, 12 Effies, 3 nominations in Cannes…

4.
